website_summaries.verdict: This uniquely-styled tie makes a great choice for a summer accessory or to wear to a beach-themed event.
pros: These ties come in more eccentric floral patterns, featuring a range of colors
This is a slimmer tie variation, measuring 2.36 inches across
Made of high-quality cotton material that stands up to the test of time
cons: Colors may appear slightly different online than they do in person

customer_reviews.title: very nice.
customer_reviews.text: These ties are beautiful, and I’m so glad we chose them for our groomsmen. The groomsmen said they were difficult to tie but they look fantastic so who cares. I loved them though!
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Look great with these beautifilul ties!
customer_reviews.text: I get some many compliments with these set of beautifully made and high quality material ties.
customer_reviews.author: TonyL

customer_reviews.title: Skinny tie
customer_reviews.text: This does not mention in the title it is a skinny tie. My son does not like skinny ties. He bought this for a wedding and is keeping it for any more weddings he will be in, but this is not his style so this will not be used on a regular basis. Nice tie, print is crisp, fabric and hang soft and good. Great price for the tie. Just know it is skinny, not regular width.
customer_reviews.author: J. Witzel

customer_reviews.title: Great once, not for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son to coordinate with mine and my daughters Easter dresses. It came quickly and was well packaged. Although it fit my large-statutered 9yo well, I don’t think it would fit an adult appropriately/well. Also, it has started peeling with many balls formed after 2 wears from my son. Was great for one days wear but not long term livability
customer_reviews.author: Foreman F.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for homecoming!
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, the actual quality and construction of the tie isn’t fantastic, but for the price, it was perfect for homecoming and looked very nice on my daughter’s date. It probably wouldn’t be the best for durability, but we loved it for one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Thacher

customer_reviews.title: Great tie, great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tie to wear to a beach wedding that I attended over the weekend, and received many compliments on it. I was extremely impressed with the quality of the product considering the low price. I'm usually not a fan of this type of tie, but it looked great paired up with a white button down and a silver tie bar. I will be purchasing different designs in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Nazario

customer_reviews.title: You get both Quality and Cost Efficiency
customer_reviews.text: Quality and price go hand in hand with this tie, and you get both in this instance! The quality is great as the tie is put together well and the price is unbelievable, this paired great with my navy blue suit for my wedding from men’s warehouse (Navy Blue Calvin Klein Slim Fit).I was able to gift my entire groomsmen party these ties as well, perfect wedding gift and perfect for the day of for the entire wedding party!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Powell

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but bad stitching
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually super bummed! Because I love this tie. It's absolutely perfect for me. I wanted a good looking casual floral tie, and I absolutely love the design and fabric of it! But the stitching is loose all along the seam and in some places completely disconnected. I can't have it falling apart in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni Dark

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it...
customer_reviews.text: My review is based on my 18 year old son's reaction--he loves this tie and that's what 5 stars mean in the Amazon rating. It does look nice with a white shirt and suit jacket. The seller we purchased from was in China so it took a few weeks for delivery. The tie is nicely sewn. You have to like the floral tie look to love this tie. If you don't like floral, don't purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie from Salt Lake City

customer_reviews.title: Ti(e)ght
customer_reviews.text: Tie looks sweet and fits like every other tie I've worn. Bought this to wear at a wedding I'll be in in a few months. So unless it spontaneously bursts into flames before then, I'll continue to be happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Devon H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tie!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband an his brother for our wedding and they were perfect! I can't believe how much ties cost so I was pretty happy to see how inexpensive this one was! Def. worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, but design is nice
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I got this product because I saw a lot great reviews, and the images looked great. However, the stitch that connects the two flaps of the tie in the middle was split upon taking the product out of the plastic packaging. Moreover, the label which tucks in the flap in the back was so loose that the flap wasn't secured against the tie's back. I do enjoy the look and design of the tie very much, but overall the stitching is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He LOVES it! HE said it's his new favorite tie, and keeps wearing it around the house. Great quality, beautiful design, came as described in nice packaging. Will definitely purchase from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: medici28

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tie. Good quality, great width, and looks good with a grey, blue, or black suit. Only downfall is that I went to a wedding and another guy had on the same exact tie. Wasn't enough for me to feel differently about it! Still my favorite tie.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a very handsome tie. I work in a large corporation and I have gotten comments on this tie only which means at least is eye-catching.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo H

customer_reviews.title: boyfriend loved it
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this tie, matched perfectly with my dress for a wedding
customer_reviews.author: Makayla Olson

customer_reviews.title: This matched PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: My Son got this tie for homecoming and he got it to match his dates dress and it was such a perfect match! Great tie well made and looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: Angel44fire

customer_reviews.title: Floral Tie, Skinny but priced right.
customer_reviews.text: Tie is very skinny material feels cheap but was purchased for a wedding attire so it’s gonna have too do. Really cheap price so not so bad.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Cute tie. Skinny thoug
customer_reviews.text: These are skinny ties but so cute and not like you can find these prints everywhere. My boys love them for church.
customer_reviews.author: 7babez

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great ties, we are using them for our wedding! Good material and very stylish
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great tie and picture as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Overall, great tie and shipping/handling was timely. Got a lot of complements and slim enough to easy to tie any knot style you want.
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this tie. It's his favorite one. Seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Its a tie
customer_reviews.text: either you like ties such as this one or not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Groomsmen gift!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great gift for groomsmen! We ordered several for our wedding party and each came in an individual plastic envelope safe and sound. Excited to give them to our guys on our wedding day!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan McDowell-Belloni

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tie!! my boyfriend got so many compliments on it! Material is better then I except!! Recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Gilmore Girls

customer_reviews.title: Great print and solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Great piece and got a ton of compliments I’ve got a few colors and love them all. Wish it weren’t quite so skinny, as I’m a large guy and it does look like a bit thin tie on a 6’+ person
customer_reviews.author: Red Forman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These ties were beautiful for our wedding. I was a little nervous of the flack I was going to get for floral ties but the groomsmen actually loved them and have worn them since the wedding for church, etc. They looked gorgeous in the photos too and what a bargain! RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirlBex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floral tie
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE TIES! Bought these for my husband and husband groomsmen for our wedding. Great for the price you’re paying. Skinny but not too skinny and floral but not too floral. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Tie
customer_reviews.text: Coloring and material were nice, color was perfect. However, I only gave a 3 star rating because the tie was a little narrow for my son, it matched what it need to match for that day, but will not be included in his usual tie rotation on game days.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pattern, however the tie is much narrower than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good tie fit well. Very skinny on the con side but overall nice tie
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: compliments EVERY TIME
customer_reviews.text: My partner convinced me to get these and I'm glad she did. I tell people that I picked them out on my own so I seem like I have fashion sense.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Great tie
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and he loves it! He has worn it dozens of times and it has held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Rfb123

customer_reviews.title: the tie itself seems well made and I like the look of it
customer_reviews.text: Well, the tie itself seems well made and I like the look of it, it's just too short. I have a thick neck sometimes run into this. Usually I can just tie a tie extra long and it will still barely fit but this tie is just too short for me. So be aware if you have a thick neck this may be a risky buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ethanam

customer_reviews.title: Really narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tie, really, but when they tell you it is really narrow, believe them! Arrived almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Downhome America

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is just lovely. It's small/thin enough to look nice on a woman. It's a nice fabric and the pattern looks just like the photo (I ordered style 14).
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Wedding
customer_reviews.text: Used these for myself and the fellers in the wedding. Quality is way better than I expected. Looks exactly like the photo. Soft to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Moyer

customer_reviews.title: This is a boy’s tie, not a man’s.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and we just laughed. No way a man could wear this. Too short and too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this tie for my brother for mine and my husband's wedding. My brother walked me down the aisle and everyone commented on how pretty his tie was :P He loved it too
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length/material and colors true to image.
customer_reviews.text: Believe me when I tell you ladies dig this tie. There's something about dressing up clean and adding a touch of softness to the outfit that makes it so worth it. I'm definitely considering buying another one, but in a different color. Looks exactly as images display.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lozano

customer_reviews.title: A Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time with colours as expected. Slight wrinkles in each tie due to packaging, but they were easily steamed out, as the ties are linen. You really can’t beat this value, especially considering the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Size Options
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made tie. I would honestly probably buy it again if I was someone who wore ties often. My only issue was that it was slightly short on me and most of the guys in the wedding I was in. I recommend maybe having size options.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little longer but overall so nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Length is too short for a 6 foot tall man
customer_reviews.text: I don't know the exact length of this tie, but it was definitely too short for my 6 foot tall husband that wears a large in men's sizes. He didn't even tie a full Windsor knot and it was still too short. The fabric was average quality. The pattern looked exactly like it did on the picture though.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customers servies and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful floral tie and customer service. All of things are look exactly like the image advertised. Clear color and printing, perfect floral neckties for Bridegroom & Groomsmen. And they got many compliments from our guest, I’m so glad I chose it for my husband and our groomsmen. if you need chose a tie for wedding, this will be first choice, Highly recommend ! It's also suit for office, my husband wear this tie every week
customer_reviews.author: Trixie Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this at my wedding. It was between this and another tie and this one won. Tons of compliments throughout the day and night!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Machado

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my best friend. He loved it. Skinny tie, very handsome yet feminine look. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Very short.
customer_reviews.text: This is the shortest tie I’ve ever seen for adults. It hit mid chest when tied. It would be great for a small child.
customer_reviews.author: J Zilinski

customer_reviews.title: Got for my boyfriend. Vibrant and Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! I got this for my boyfriend and checked in the mail and it is so cute!! It has a nice stark contrast between the black and pink colors, its really nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Belle K

customer_reviews.title: Love the casual material and the not too slim look
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the black and navy blue ties. They are both true to color from the displayed pictures. Love the casual material and the not too slim look. With having a great price and multiple color ways would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome the!
customer_reviews.text: So cute, my fiancé loves it! Not Hermès quality, but made well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not a tie for fat people!
customer_reviews.text: Skinny and short tie. Not a tie for fat people!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: I love this tie (a little longer than most fyi) I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this tie (a little longer than most fyi) I get so many compliments on it, I wear a lot of ties and this is the one that has received the most love from people.
customer_reviews.author: Nels

customer_reviews.title: Good design and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap ties are the best because you don’t have to wear them again
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Janusz

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Love it when my husband wears this tie. I wish it were longer. He has to retie it a few times to get it just right because it's not as long as the rest of his other ties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really thin
customer_reviews.text: It took long to arrive. I thought it will be a thick tie as the regular ones I’m used to seeing, instead it was very slim and thin. The material is cheap. I bought it for a gift and I never gave it to the person because of the bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wedding day. My husband and my brother wore one. Look exactly as pictured and quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Gets lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: This 4 tie set with the same pattern but these colors allow you to match virtually every suit or casual outfit you own. Super versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jackson

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting so many great compliments on these ties. They feel like they are quality made. Would definitely purchase ties like these again!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and a great size.
customer_reviews.text: Most ties I purchase are too long for my body, but this one was the right size! It's definitely one of my favorite ties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... wore it for our wedding and it was the perfect length. The fabric is nice and the print ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband wore it for our wedding and it was the perfect length. The fabric is nice and the print (we got the navy floral) is lovely. He hasn't worn it a lot since our wedding but it seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marielle Edscorn

customer_reviews.title: Yellow tinted
customer_reviews.text: I gave this tie four stars because it was actually kinda yellow - this picture looks white
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for special occasions
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn this once, but the material was the perfect thickness and the design was printed perfectly. I cant say wether or not it will hold up over time, but this tie is perfect for special occasions!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Evans

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, looked nice. Great colors. We used it once for a wedding. Not sure about long term use
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Yarusewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great tie
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and I’d a great tie for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Good tie for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, well made and affordable. I get compliments on this tie every time I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and washable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this tie. It's made of heavy cotton so it will wash, dry and iron nicely when our 5mo son spits up on it. He gets compliments every time he wears it.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirlCTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Skinny tie and a little bit short
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality tie. Bought it for my dad and he's a bigger guy so the tie was a little bit short and it's a skinny tie but overall it looked fine on him.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyNunnally

customer_reviews.title: Great looking ties for my navy/blush wedding
customer_reviews.text: These worked out well. The groom and groomsmen loved them very much. Can't beat the pricing too))
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: nice tie
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design but it was a little to narrow for my taste
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color and design
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tie! It’s skinny so make sure that is the style you want (it was for us)!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cox

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tie
customer_reviews.text: The main color of this tie turned out to be more of a light purple than a grey, but a great tie nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Newton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This tie was really beautiful and exactly as pictured! Perfect for a groom or father of the bride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It turn out perfect and it looked very good quality and for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last minute for my fiancé for our themed birthday. It turn out perfect and it looked very good quality and for the price I would totally recommend it

customer_reviews.title: I love them, they look amazing on him
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas and he loves them, I love them, they look amazing on him!!♥️
customer_reviews.author: Angel LeFevre

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome tie for the spring/ weddings
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome tie for the spring/ weddings. I bought this a while back and finally got to where this to a couple of weddings and got a lot of compliments. I would highly recommend this skinny tie to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Vu

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This tie was a hit, they were bought as groomsmen ties and looked to be better quality then i expected. The print was perfect and i was surprised by how many people asked where i found them. They were a perfect accent to a beautiful wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Netter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it; my husband has reservations about the width. It's time he pay attention to fashion again. Ha-ha!

customer_reviews.title: Duplicate to name brand
customer_reviews.text: This is almost an exact replica of a name brand tie that my son wanted. Found this for half price. It came fast and is great quality. Ended up buying two more because my other two sons loved it so much.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Bold statement with a floral tie; I liked it and was a good value.

customer_reviews.text: Looks great, everything we thought it would be. Definitely not too skinny.

customer_reviews.title: It is WORTH it!
customer_reviews.text: By far a 10/10 product; the material is great, it’s not one of those plastic like ties that you sometimes find, color and pattern is awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: this is a skinny tie

customer_reviews.text: This tie was perfect for our wedding day! My husband loved it, and got lots of compliments! So happy with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Super Trendy!
customer_reviews.text: This tie was a great additional to my partner's outfit for a friend's wedding! It was such a good price considering similar products online are more expensive and it didn't feel like cheap material.

customer_reviews.text: Simple great ties. You get exactly what is pictured (when ordering the packs with multiple ties). Good quality and tough to beat for the price.

customer_reviews.title: For a Wedding
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautiful tie and perfect for the wedding party...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This time looked great on me and it looks very elegant and simple, loved it!

customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic, exactly as described. The overall quality seems good for the price.

product_meta.title: Mantieqingway Men's Cotton Printed Floral Neck Tie
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :7 x 3 x 0.8 inches; 1.59 Ounces
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :June 21, 2016
 * ASIN :B01HCSTKMQ

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #24,561 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #1 inMen's Novelty Neckties 
    *  #12 inMen's Neckties 
    *  #6265 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars728 ratings
feature_bullets: Retro floral ties for men - Made of the flexible and high-quality cotton material, it is comfortable to wear and soft touch,
Mens print skinny neck tie - Size about length 57'' * width 2.36'', short than standard necktie, suit for the most of mens, it's an necessary outfit accessories for gentleman.
Great Value Tie Collections - Retro and stylish printed designed bowtie, it is will maks you differents than others whatever you wear it to attend any formal & informal occassion.

Romantic Flower Tie - Navy blue ties easy to matching with shirt, perfect for handsome bridegroom & groomsmen. Matching bowtie please search " Mantieqingway Pre-Tied Mens Bow Ties Adjustable Cotton Print Bowties Tuxedo Floral Bow Tie for Wedding “.

Warm Tips - Better to dry clean, never place ties in washer or dryer as this will ruin the fabric and damage the sewing of the tie.Creases and folds Iron on low heat, you can iron directly on the design.
